Blog.post: once again bordem is my enemy. well wat can i tlak about today...ummm...well im all alone at dads house cos dads at work and my bro adam has gone to hs maths teachers house to do her gardening and sme painting..which i find reel freaky, a student going ova to a teachers house to fix it up...even though she's kool and in a wheelchair...its scary. well last night i went to whitney's ouse and kris was there and they were reeli pissing me off. asking me about....well i cant say what about but yer they were annoying. and ummm.....yer we just sat around on the bed while they told me stuff. which was pretty fun. shit there is nothing to do on the holidays. last holidays i went to japan for the two weeks which was pretty kool. ad in two weeks im having some japanese student come and stay with me for two weeks. im trying to think of some more bullshit i can talk about cos noratiah told me to bitch and bullcrap about people...cos shes a bitch. i just msged whitney to see what her and kris are doing toay but they are LAZY FAT BITCHES...hahaha nah they are going out...im going to go and fone my mum and see what she's doing today. goodbye folks.

well once again bordem has struck so i think its time for me to write in my blog...well last night after i had posted my Blog (what a stoopid name...blog) n e wayz last night after i had published my blog...i told jess about it and what des she do....she advertises her blog in the comments.... now this is just not on jess....when skool starts im going to kik your ass...thats right...shit is going to hit the fan. well enough about jess....shes ugly and has no friends and is a ranga so we shall hate her for it...n e wayz...last night kris and toni came on (tonis also a ranga....so we hate her too)...well they came online and they just wouldnt shut the f**k up...stoopid women.... well last night noratiah (what a gay name) thought that i sohuld bitch a lil bit more (cos thats all she does) and write about more crap... so....lets see...whats crap at the moment....well i had a f**ked up dream last night....my sister was in my room and she had dropped her marijuana in the corridor and i was running after her (she was in the car) trying ot give it back to her...and amazingly...i kept up with her....(im fat so its amazing that i could run fast) ummm....what else is there to talk about.... nothing...im going to go now cos lauren is emailing me some questions....ooooo...jk....oh yer today we (me, my bro and dad) might be going house hunting...cos dads house is a piece of shit and it is f**king freeeeeeezing... toodle oooo from scuba steve / conehead / and normal steven (im a skitzo)

ok well i tried it and it didnt work so ill try it again...im so computer unco sumtimes...did that make sense...well b4 i wrote about how lauren was looking up PORN in desktop publishing...nah...i aint going to splain it...if u wanna know just ask lauren... i am so bored there is nothing to do on the net...i woul go on ebaumsworld but my net is tooo slow for the stuff to load. and i dont like waiting...on friday in s&e we went on ebaumsworld.com and looked at everyuthing we could...its the best site. well im oging to go and hopefully it f***ing works this time...i dont know if this is going to be a regular thing...im just doing it cos im sooooo bored toodle ooo scuba steve / conehead (i have a split personality)

ok ok ok...the last blog entry didnt quite nock ur socks off...but this time...it probly still wont cos well...ill admit it...whitneys fat....nah im onli joking its just a joke...nah my life aint as exciting as it used to be....oh i so hope whitney doesnt read this.... ok well....today i took my sisters dog for a walk...hes a great dane and hes fuking huge....and i was playing with him out the back and hes so clumsy and dopey...he kept jumping on me and it hurt. cos he fell ontop of me. ok sorri whitney...toni-man just told me that i should stop teasing you...so ill stop...i promise...ill onli call u fat about...10 or 20 times a day now...instead of 30...hahahaha...im oni joking...ill cut down...i need a few nic-o-fat patchs to help me cut down though...(hahaha nic-o-fat...god im funny) hey nicole free grab...hahaha use dont get it...personal joke between me and nicole... and kristine....fuk off...another personal joke..u had to be there ok well toodles for now fwom shteeve p.s....i like ice-cream

yes the truth hurts and lauren and kris...learn to live with it...ur both ugly (thats cos they called me ugly which as u all know...is a fuking lye) ok well i bet uve all been wondering where i have been for the past few weeks...seeing as how i havent written on here in sooo long...its cos i was too busy working the streets and my ass is killing...i mean it...those donkeys take it like a bitch. hahaha...did that make sense. well ok now down to the serious stuff....hahah that sounds so funny coming form me... well ummm im trying to think what i can type but i cant think cos ...i have no brian...well i do its just mostley concentratating on sex at the moment!!! oh yer and nicole if ur reading this which u probly will...dont be jealous cos my titts are bigger and better than urs...just tell the truth....u want my titts....as much as every1 else does. well ummm...ok sorri whit for telling u ur fat....just telling it like it is...hahaha jk....u can put on a hateful comment (if ur fingers are skinny enough to touch one key at a time)...hahaha jk... and ummm...omg atiah....do u know when to shuttup..u bitch about everything and ummm......yer sarah i dont know u but .... ur fat and ugly.....hahaha jk and jess smith...(who looks like Mr ed....i hate u so much....ur annoying...but ive learned to live with it. ok well im going ot go b4 i sound reeli bithcy....cos like....well i am i just dont want use to know... toodle oooo fwom shteeve
